comments.title: Do not buy such products
comments.description: I got it delivered in time. Installation service was horrible. Later on I got it installed from a local guy. Then E5 error was noticed. They said outdoor unit is defective. I started contacting service engineers and customer services but everything was useless. It’s a great pain if you get an ac installed and not working. With a great goggling I thought of initiating through Amazon refund policy. Amazon Representatives asked me to contact service engineer, who was never approachable. Amazon representative asked me for Job Sheet of ac installation which I did not have as it was not installed by Lloyd service engineer. These all happened on 19,04.2022. When customer support did not agree for return and refund they said they will send Amazon service engineer on 22.04.2022 to verify that E5 error exists and outdoor unit is defective. That engineer did not visit the site, but asked the image of the error. Once I complained the same to Amazon  24.04.2022 was fixed to get it verified. Thanks GOD it was updated by Amazon that  they will get it collected. 26,04.2022 was fixed for collecting and it’s done now. How easy it is to get Lloyd ac installed. They have spoiled my two weeks Thanks to Amazon for initiating refund. Now I don’t know whether they will pay the cost incurred for installation and un-installation.  The best thing is I got it from a local dealer “NOT THE SAME COMPANY” now and he will look after AC for all these issues. NEVER EVER BUY IT.

comments.title: Almost silent , quick cooling AC
comments.description: This AC was installed the very next day after delivery thanks to the WhatsApp Havells- Llyod helpline. The installation cost about 2500 along with drilling a hole through the wall. Installation took about one and a half hour and was flawless . They even closed the hole and dressed it with white cement. You would need to take care to provide a plug point close to where you want to install the Indore unit and identify a place on the other side for outdoor unit. Also consider how you will route the water drain pipe on the outside.

comments.title: Never make the mistake of buying Voltas ac
comments.description: I bought voltas inverter ac on 24 april. It was installed two days later. On 29th may it stopped working. I raised a complaint and was told that PCB has gone bad. The problem is wity the stabilizer and with the voltage in the society. There is no issue with either the stabilizer or voltage. I was using LG ac 1.5 ton before voltas. It worked without any issues, same house, same stabilizer. The voltage is consistent at 250. How is that an issue.

comments.description: This company is really pathetic. I dont understand why these people rated 5 star. they dont deserve this much rating. Their customer service really sucks and i am surprised by thier response that they gave me. Let me tell you my story first 2 techinician came for ac service they told us that your ac fan is destroyed we have to install the new one and that technician requested company for that part. I have asked them how many it will take because some guest will visit us soon they told us it will take some time like that i have waited after 13 days they came and installed small fan in it and i have asked them to check if there any problem or not then they checked it and said all okay. Then after that i have felt that my ac not cooling i have called their customer service for that they didn't reply. I have filed written complaint to them and they didn't revert back. After that they answerd my call and gave staff number and i have called them she told me that they receive 600 up calls from customer and this is our rush hour then i said this is your problem if you face this problem in every summer why dont you take out some solution for that. Then i said some guest are going to visit us soon so that why i want you to come urgently then she said i will allot the technician he will visit you Tomorrow. After that nobody came and then i got one message from them we canceld your request because my ac is a non voltas product. Now i want to ask this people one question do you take me as a fool or do you think i dont have any sense do you think that i dont know which company ac i have this is really unexpected from them and i my eyes they deserve 0 star.

comments.title: Super product with 2 services free of cost from Voltas.
comments.description: Its been an year of use and now i am writing this. I have had bad experiences with voltas earlier but this AC is a go with both eyes closed. Even after an year of use, very less noise level as voltas always have been but not really that bad as it was 2021 edition so they actually have improved there new edition products. And they give you 2 free of cost services, though you dont need much service in the first year but it still is a service… After an year of use i still put it on sleep mode or else it chills the gods out of me at night… Really didnt thought voltas can make things like this but amazing things happen when you least expect them so, 2021 edition onwards are super build quality. Don’t fall into the facade of O’general and Hitachi and all, its a cheap 5 star AC with better results. Go for it.

comments.title: BlueStar continued making best products
comments.description: I have BlueStar 1.5 ton 5 Star inverter split in my Living Room already and giving very good energy efficiency and it is showing in my bills. I have window ac in my bedroom which is very old and I repaired it twice. Also it generates higher units in bills.So this summer I don't want to repair it again. I decided to go for new split 5 star 1 ton AC. So I started searching, comparing rates in shops and online. So far I got best deal on Amazon in summer sale. I got this BlueStar for 29k on exchange of old ac. I am writing this review after using it only for 2 days. So I will update it after some months. Installation charges are approx 1200. If more copper pipe required it costs 300/MTR. It has no horizontal swing only vertical swings. Most of 1 ton split acs not having that except LG and some other couple of brands I found. It has backlit remote. Outdoor unit is not having much sound. Indoor unit sound is below 30db.

comments.description: My suggestion is Don’t buy this AC, there service networks is very limited. Even Amazon will not support you in the installation, I have struggled 4 days for installation. I have purchased Bluestar AC dated 11-04-2022 form Amazon, and now I realized that it is worst purchase of my life. I have not used this AC peacefully for even one day. Initially I have to struggle for almost 4 days for installation. During installation technician installed it wrong and due to which my AC blower started making noise. When I complained about it technicians were not accepting their fault and saying its normal noise. Finally AC blower fins damaged and now my AC is stopped, I am fortunate that it I am still alive else it may catch fire. Bluestar service center is saying parts is in transit and every time they are giving me a new date.

I bought this during the peak season and had to pay approx 42k, which I believe is very expensive considering the overall life of the product. The installation team also took additional money 900 for stand, 1100 for installation(which includes drilling and installing indoor and outdoor) and 200 for additional 1 mtr wire. You can get his installed outside with much less price but you may not get the warranty. Overall installation team was good and they completed the work however it could be better if they would have avoided creating too much dust in house due to drilling work.

comments.title: Bad Customer Service
comments.description: The product is really good. No doubt about it. This is not a product review. This is about the service. I bought this on 4-May. It was delivered on 6-May. So good so far. I am from Hyderabad. I live in the center of the town. The AC was installed on 10-May; 4 days after delivery. The same day I raised a complaint about very high noise levels in the indoor unit. A technician came after 4 days, on 14-May, and identified that the blower is faulty and it needs to be replaced. Finally, the faulty blower was replaced on 28-May after several follow-ups. Did not expect such a bad experience from Panasonic.

comments.title: Installation costs are too high and no proper accounting of service
comments.description: The product installation cost amounted to 7000(material cost for stand, copper tube etc) + 1650 for installation service. Total installation cost is 20 percent of the product cost. Additionally the ODU was defective and the valve inside ODU was leaking gas. Firstly the installation happened after 5 days of receiving the unit and within 2 days the gas was gone due to leakage. Again I raised request for the issue and after 2-3 days the guys said they tightened the valve and refilled the gas and charged another 2000. They did not provide a copy of defect report of what is the issue and a receipt for the repair And they also gave an advise to me that my mistake is to buy from online and I should have gone to the shop and bought the AC

comments.title: No that happy with installation. Required repair after 2 days of installation.
comments.description: Installation was done next day after receiving AC. Please note that ordering online means they don't send any copper pipe, wire or even plug socket. Everything is charged extra. Total installation cost me 9300. Including around 7m piping. The piping was also not done neatly as you can see in pics. AC worked fine for 2 days and stopped working after that. Panasonic sent a technician the next day to check and he came with proper tools the day after that to fix the leak in connector and refill the gas again. Seems to be working fine for now. Attached pics to show what kind of installation is done, even broke pieces of wall by hammer drilling too close to the edge.

comments.title: Quality of the remote buttons is not very good. Have to press it really hard to change settings.
comments.description: AC as such is working fine. The installation was pretty smooth. We had an issue of water leaking where they had connected the extended pipe but they came and sorted it immediately the next day. Noise cannot be noticed unless you switch off the AC. That's when you realise it was making some noise. We haven't got the electricity bill yet, so too early to comment on energy efficiency. The remote though lets the AC down. The buttons are really hard to press. Its better to control it through the phone but then you have to keep your Wi-Fi on all the time

comments.title: Copper wire not included
comments.description: I purchased it on 5 April 2022, got delivered it on Apr 10 2022, Installation guy came today on April 11, 2022. He informed me that there is ongoing issue with Panasonic AC as they're missing Copper wire and they'll provide job sheet and Amazon will reimburse it. I called Amazon before installation but they denied it stating copper wire is not included in the package. I humbly informed them all ACs come with default 3m wire and all other retailers (local + flipkart) are providing wire with the AC as per installation person from Panasonic. Atlast I decided to return it and I suggest everyone not to buy this AC.

On 5th day i was about to return the product as it was taking way too long for the installation but then I had contacted one last time to customer support and ask them to transfer me to ESCALATION DEPARTMENT then I got the manager of customer care on line explained him all the details then he added the manager of the service center for my location and raised the issue then on the same day service center sent tha guy and the installation was completed. But again I had to pay 1300rs for installation 1000rs for outdoor unit stand 500 for extra wire and 5700rs for extra copper pipe as only 3 meters copper pipe came with the unit and for my outdoor unit i had to buy 6 meter extra as I live on ground floor and fixed my outdoor unit on terrace. So total i had to pay around 9k for complete installation.

comments.title: ****ATTENTION**** WORST EVER AC***** PLEASE DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY*****
comments.description: This product and brand is a sham. We bought this product last month on 4th of April 2022. The experience from the very beginning was a nightmare. We had to do multiple follow ups to even get it installed. When at last, the installation guy came and opened the box, we found that the copper pipe was missing and had to buy it separately for ₹3200. And now just after a month the AC has stopped working. We raised a service request and the ticket was forwarded to Panasonic Service Agency (SRI NIKHIL DIGITAL SERVICES - Sanyo Service Center K.v.rangareddy, Telangana) and Spoke to *Mr. Gangadhar Reddy* (most annoying person ever he even abused us multiple times), he sent a technician and they told us that the outer unit isn't working, there is a GAS LEAKAGE. Technician even told me that they are receiving a lot of complaints regarding such issues. Technician visited again and did the welding work inside the outdoor unit for which he has to dismantle the entire outdoor unit. After he completed the work, technician asked us to TURN ON the AC. The moment we switched ON the AC the master MCB got tripped and the technician kept repeating the same thing again and again. As a result of which the Master MCB got tripped *THRICE*. Technician told me because of this tripping issue (some wrong wiring connection from his end) the indoor to outdoor wire might has blasted and his manager *(Gangadhar Reddy) called me and asked to pay ₹1500-2000* to change the wiring. He wanted us to pay this amount without any reason. He was extremely rude and clearly said they can't do anything about it. *Infact, he even closed the service request without our consent. We raised another service request as the issue was not resolved but *Gangadhar Reddy* *again closed the second ticket.* We are now struggling to get this AC replaced. Such a horrible experience. We usually buy Voltas AC. This was the first time we tried Panasonic and it was such a huge mistake.

comments.title: DONOT BUY-Just after 1.3 yrs the coil is leaking and Service charges are 10k which is 1/3 AC cost
comments.description: I bought this AC in Feb-2021. Just after 1.3 yrs it stopped cooling - when called up Panasonic service the technician confirmed the coil in outdoor unit is leaking. This coil is inside the outdoor unit box and no one know why it went bad. Panasonic talks about rust proof/corrosion resistant materials but with in such short span the coil went bad and leaking AC gas. Not I have been asked to pay about Rs.10,000 for the new coil and gas filling which is almost 1/3rd of total AC cost that I bought. Believing that Panasonic is Japan based company and has great technology - was a MISTAKE. Pathetic product - even a local made AC would last for couple of yrs w/o any issues. I would suggest - not to buy this and get in to troubles.

comments.title: WORST RESPONSE FROM PANASONIC ON COMPLAIN AGAINST OVERPRICED INSTALLTION
comments.description: It's too early to comment on performance of AC as it's just been 15 days of installation. However, I would like to mention "WORST RESPONSE" from Panasonic Co., side on installation concern. They don't take any cognizance on complain against Installation agencies who charge exorbitant price for installation accessories. If you wish to provide them installation accessories from your side , they will increase installation charges arbitrarily and blatantly say "Its Co Policy". I made several complains to Panasonic against such overpriced installation services but they remain mum for two days. Ultimately I had to get the installation done at a very high price.

comments.title: Ticks most boxes
comments.description: It has almost everything you may want in an inverter AC. It may not be best in class on any one parameter except being WIFI enabled, but it is very good in all aspects, at least no.2 in all. Cooling is smooth and efficient, noise is very acceptable and energy efficiency had better be good, being 5 star, but too early for me to tell. A feature missing is horizontal swing. Only vertical automatic swing is available and louvers have to be manually positioned for horizontal air flow. Apart from that, installation is pathetic. The first person who attended looked too young. He abandoned the job citing difficulties and I had to lodge a complaint. You also have to do your own wiring unlike what's done for other brands. So the installation tieup of the panasonic - Flipkart nexus is poor.

comments.title: Cheated by Amazon
comments.description: Bought an ac which got delivered on 23rd march and installed on 25th March. The cooling was never the best but got swayed by service engineer comments ( new ac takes time to cool to at its best)  the cooling started degrading day after day and on 3rd april night the cooling totally stoped. I called the hitachi service engineer and after diagnosis if found on gas was there inside the ac that surely means all gas leaked . And I recieved a faulty product from start itself. Instantly I tried replacing my product but it showed that replacement window closed on 2nd april itself. Tell me how can a lame common person guess whether gas is leaking as its odourless and clolouless. Nor does it leaks all at once.it took 10 days to leak completly and amazon has set the replacement window of just 10 days. The service provider is now saying he doesn't has the expertise to repair it and I have 2 years manufacturing warranty. Now I am stuck in whirlwind of farud and despair. Cloudtail is not listening to my requests.nor is hitachi. I will suggest any future buyers to not buy any refrigeration and cooling product from amzaon. Because they literally dont care for you.

comments.description: Good Product. Good cooling. No need to run ac whole night. Use the sleep option. No voice heard as the cooling unit is installed outside. There is no annoying neon lights on the blower as seen in the several other models. It is worth for Rs. 36k. Customer service is very dreadful. Booking the installation service over phone itself was a nightmare. Calls got disconnected while talking to the customer service. Tried Messaging service which was crashing very often. In that process end up in registering twice for single item. A day wasted in that process. Received a call on third day morning from a Hitachi technician about his assignment to install my ac but didn't give a definite or probable time. Waited for whole day carrying my phone wherever I moved in my house but around 5 pm a person from Hitachi customer service called and started blaming me that I was not attending phone and forced me to give back mouthful as the contention was a lie. On third day morning two other technicians called but they arrived after 1 pm. These Hitachi technicians were very horrible as they were leaving out the things which are not in their schedule even it was essential. As I had a fair idea about the nitty gritty of the installation of a c  I had to categorically tell them the things which are essential but not in the installation schedule of Hitachi  should be done even if it costs extra which will be paid. While attaching wires with naked ends at terminals when questioned why the ends naked and not crimped with sockets only to be told that Hitachi don't supply it. But, I found the crimping sockets next day in the cardboard package before I threw out. There is no clarity about scheduled maintenance under the warrantee period.

Now when I put on the unt it makes a very loud noise like something is hitting the blades. Getting the service centre to come and repair is another task. I have to tell them to clean and they behave like they are doing you a favor. Worst company ever. Please do not waste your money on this porduct or any Hitachi porducts have a feeling everything is made in China of 3rd quality products. Hitachi is just a name of the past now nothing else.

comments.title: Seller misinformation
comments.description: This is the 2nd AC Bought from same seller with the same issue. Plus the model is 2021 and not 2022 as claimed. I had hoped that I’d be one of the lucky people who has a smooth installation experience, since the temperature has been bad enough! But unfortunately I am not - There is no copper pipe and it costs 850/meter! So I paid extra for the AC itself and on top of that the seller leaves out the copper pipe. Besides that it has been impossible to raise a complaint on Amazon in real-time. The automated options do not help resolve missing item issue. I was left with 2 options: return the item and wait another few weeks for AC or pay for the copper pipe. I went with the latter. I hope the seller will refund the amount paid for the pipe, will update if anything changes.

comments.title: Extremely bad customer service
comments.description: The AC is throwing current through its Earthing wire, which is in turn getting carried to our other devices and sockets in our home. I raised a request to customer care. After waiting for 9 days, the technician sent an associate of his to my home and he checked the outer connections and came to the conclusion that there's no proper earthing at our home. But we have already checked that with our local electrician and he confirmed our earthing is okay. The technician checked with his tools and got voltage on the body, but they kept sticking to their initial statement, that the earthing of our home is faulty. They even said it's by design that an inverter AC will constantly throw current through the earthing wire which is completely unacceptable.

comments.title: Don’t buy from this seller
comments.description: So I purchased this in 2nd of April and today it’s 13th may, in this duration only 20 days Ac has been run where 3 times I have already raised a complaint for gas leakage. Plus pathetic service from LG people. They are keep on sending their service engineers who are not able to locate the reason for gas leakage and keep on refilling the gas every time. If the Ac was not under warranty then I have to pay for their each visit and gas filling charges. But this problem is persistent and they are behaving the same way. Please don’t purchase online go for offline purchase atleast you can trace the vendor. Here I’m just helpless calling LG service centre again and again daily and imagine living without Ac in NCR summers. We order online from Amazon for comfort but no point if we are not getting that support from anywhere.

Note that core cutting was required in this case, so 3000 rupees from that total was just for that. Even then, that is still 4115 per AC for installation. Don't believe the installation charges mentioned on Amazon, that's just the base amount upon which they will add on charges upon charges.

The only Con is that the cleaning process of the indoor unit will not be easy as you will have to open the front cover everytime with screw driver which is not user friendly. LG should remove this flaw. Can the AC function without the drain pipe, LG should answer this. Otherwise the product deserves 5 stars for the features.

comments.title: Perfect and really energy efficient for my use case.
comments.description: I required an AC for around 200sq. ft room where direct sunlight only falls in the morning till 10'o clock. Middle floor. My use case was for daily usage of around 14 hrs mixing my work hours and sleep hours at 27-28°C for ambient comfort (Shimla not desired). In current season, using it in monsoon mode mostly mixing it with occasional cool mode for the right ambient balance. I have seen the the usage going as low as 290W. So for my use case, it is working perfectly. will suggest the same model with wifi, remote would not be required at all then and UI of app is also good & functional. One of my worries was missing components from the packaging like copper pipes as many have reviewed and complained before. But nothing was missing in my case. Fixing the indoor unit, Outdoor stand setup, Connecting with stabilizer and a drill hole during cost me ₹1700. 1500 was fixed installation charges about which I was informed beforehand and 200 for outdoor stand fixing as per the described charges. Installation was done same day of delivery. So all in all happy with the product currently.

comments.title: Good AC but installation is very expensive
comments.description: Hi. AC was installed yesterday and is working fine. Cooling is very good and no noise. The installation cost, especially copper pipe is too expensive. They charged me Rs. 1000 per meter for copper pipe. AC copper pipe is  available on Amazon at Rs. 200 per meter and copper pipe insulation foam is a available on Amazon for Rs. 100 per meter. So total cost on Amazon is Rs. 300 per meter. Just way too expensive pricing by installation team for copper pipe. They charged me Rs. 4500 for 4.5 meter pipe and Rs. 7046 overall for installation. Don't know if this is standard rate of copper pipe from LG or if the local installer is overcharging. Please source copper pipe locally or on Amazon instead of buying from installation team. They also put some white tape on the insulatiom foam, and charged Rs. 440 for it, which is not needed. Save your money. Hope this helps.

comments.title: Worst service, but good product
comments.description: This review is for the service rather than the product. Checked the price here and at an electronic store, it was available for 3K less at the store. So bought it. The basic installation costs Rs.1415/-, which is standard I guess. But too much for us, because the outdoor unit can be placed right behind the room in the Balcony. And the technician couldn't do the basic connection with the wire for power. Had to call Electrician for that, he just joined the wire and charged 300 bucks :/. And the way of installation was not professional at all as they promote. They left all the packaging as it is, the sand and cement from drilling and plastering around the pipe has not been done. Why the hell do they charge so much the work isn't worth that much. The LG service is way too bad. All show and promotion about service, but nothing much in reality. The products are good, but without proper service there's no use of buying expensive electronics.

comments.title: Buy it at your own peril.
comments.description: First of all, it failed to do what it was supposed to do i.e cool the room down. The cooling effect wasn't enough. Secondly, it became an exhaust pipe inside the room! 4 days of cooling insufficiently, the AC became a bane in my life slowly starting to turn things black. On the 5th after installation, I took my dog for a walk, 20 min later I walked into a room that was visibly covered in black smoke, you could see it in the air. Everything in the room turned black including the unit itself, my wife and I coughed out black phlegm  for 2 days! Thank God for Amazon, it was under 10 day return window, returned it and replaced it with panasonic! They charged 6k for installation, I paid an additional 3k for Uninstaller and installing the new AC, total 9k in the hole, but it was worth it to replace it with the panasonic.

comments.title: Worst Experience! GO LOCAL for Installation
comments.description: As I see 80% of the reviews are regarding installation issues. Which I faced the same today. But why it is not taking care? Yes, to install the AC they need to remove the old one if they have. They did but there no need of any drilling holes and installing new stands. Nothing is needed in my case. All they have to remove the old one and mount the new one. But after installation also they said it is 1420 Rs. I have given money and then they were asking for 600 more for removing the old AC. I denied and I called Amazon customer care they said no need to pay for removing. She (Amazon) even said it is not their issue, LG customer care is also not informed me about removing charges. Since I denied, the installation guy abused my family and cursed while leaving. He shouted on us. Why should we take these all? This is so hurting. My father tried arguing then that he will not give. This is so frustrating whole day, there is no happiness in buying new AC. Worst Experience. Even delivery guys asking charges again.

Even if your ac is working fine just book a technician and do a yearly maintenance in product warranty period

comments.title: Good AC, monstrous chilling capability but stupid logic limits cooling performance
comments.description: This AC has the potential to absolutely  chill even in 46* with sunlight bursting in through your high rise glass windows but IT DOES NOT. The logic built in to it is frustrating & stupid. It’s meant to save energy but when you need maximum cooling, you will beat your head. If you switch on AC during afternoon & set temp to 16 & fan to high, it will pick up at more than 1800 watts and up to 2100 watts (I have seen this) which means much beyond 1.5 tonnage. But when the temperature of the room comes down to say 24 or lower then it will reduce tonnage not just to 1.5 which is the rated standard capacity but even lower. At night it does not like going above approx 1000 watts no matter if you set it to 16*.

comments.title: Don't buy from Amazon
comments.description: I'd recommend buying the product straight from LG. I was assured by LG technicians and the multiple reviews from other customers that Amazon would be refunding me for the copper wire if it does not come with the air conditioner (as it should). Amazon refused to refund the full amount for it because the job sheet/receipt mentions "copper wire" whereas Amazon's product description mentions an interconnecting wire. A copper wire costs more than 3000 and is not an amount that a lot of people can afford to play word games over.

comments.title: Best ac for medium room size.
comments.description: I purchased this ac after doing a lot of research. Blue star offers 10 years of compressor warranty for this inverter ac, which very few brands provide. This ac is very powerful on turbo mode. Very energy efficient, 520 units per year is mentioned for its 3 star rating and no other ac provides this much low consumption even in 0.8 ton capacity. If u run it on eco mode it comes very low electricity usage, equal to cooler. The noise level is perfect, it does not make much noise. You can peacefully sleep. The remote is not that great because it does not have led display in it. So you might face issues in night while using it or changing temps. Overall a very good ac, lowest power consumption and good cooling at good price. I bought this ac 1 year ago and no issues at all and i bought it at 24k discounted price. One of the best ac’s available in market today. You can make it a smart ac by using a syska wifi plug with it. I use syska plus and i am controlling my ac through my mobile phone, it shows me power consumption, which i am monitoringbsince last year and really very low consumption it i compare to other ac’s installed in my house. Definitely go for this one without any doubts. Long life of 10 years, all the parts made of copper unlike other brands whole offer aluminum and great cooling! Thanks Blue Star.
